ing: 1 red onion, halved and thinly sliced
des: "A delicious blue cheese party spread made with red onion, and marinated in vinaigrette dressing."
ins: In a glass dish or serving bowl, layer the blue cheese and onion. Mix together the olive oil, lemon juice, vinegar, garlic, mustard powder and pepper. Pour over the blue cheese and onions, and let stand for 1 hour at room temperature to marinate. Serve on cocktail rye slices.
